name: restify-seed
description: A simple bootstrap project to create APIs with Restify library.

scripts.containerized: s2i build -q . registry.access.redhat.com/rhoar-nodejs/nodejs-8 local-develop && docker run --rm -p 8080:8080 local-develop
scripts.report: node_modules/.bin/jslint --indent 2 --color 'package.json' 'index.js' 'routes/**/*.js' 'common/**/*.js' 'tests/**/*.js' && LOG_LEVEL=error node_modules/.bin/mocha -c -u qunit --timeout 5000 --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./report.xml tests

author: Caio Medeiros Pinto <camedeir@redhat.com>
